NUMPOLLIES 90
// -------------triangle corridor-----------------
//floor 1
0.0 0.0 -10.0 -10.0 10.0
0.0 1.0 -10.0 -10.0 -70.0
1.0 1.0 10.0 -10.0 -70.0
//2
0.0 0.0 -10.0 -10.0 10.0
1.0 0.0 10.0 -10.0 10.0
1.0 1.0 10.0 -10.0 -70.0

//left 3

//4

//right 5

//6

1.0 0.0 0.0 10.0 10.0
0.0 0.0 0.0 10.0 -70.0

// -------------big room-----------------
// floor 7
